AlphaStar AI достиг уровня grandmaster в Старкрафте II
02 Nov 2019, 22:49 by GenrichMatushka3



AlphaStar vs Grandmaster [PvZ] Deepmind A.I. Starcraft 2https://deepmind.com/blog/article/AlphaStar-Grandmaster-level-in-StarCraft-II-using-multi-agent-reinforcement-learning AlphaStar is the result of the Deepmind …www.youtube.com
Уровень grandmaster достигнут для всех трех рас, ранг лучше 99.8% игроков на Battle.net.Статья на DeepMind.Статья в Nature.Реплеи можно скачать здесь.Обсуждение на Reddit. Обсуждение на Hacker News.
text:
AlphaStar AI reaches grandmaster level in Starcraft II
02 Nov 2019, 22:49 by GenrichMatushka3



AlphaStar vs Grandmaster [PvZ] Deepmind A.I. Starcraft 2https: //deepmind.com/blog/article/AlphaStar-Grandmaster-level-in-StarCraft-II-using-multi-agent-reinforcement-learning AlphaStar is the result of the Deepmind ... www.youtube.com
The grandmaster level is achieved for all three races, the rank is better than 99.8% of players on Battle.net. Article on DeepMind. Article on Nature. Replay can be downloaded here. Discussion on Reddit. Discussion on Hacker News.
